title: Boost progression of Ripmo, Reign and Offering V2 w/ Cascade Components Custom Links
content:
Suspension linkage manufacturers Cascade Components have added aftermarket links for Ibis, Evil and Giant. Owners of the Ripmo V2, Ripmo AF, Offering V2 and 2018-2020 Reign can now take advantage of more progressive links, said to provide more suppleness off the top of the stroke and more ramp toward the end of the travel. Here [â€¦]

The post Boost progression of Ripmo, Reign and Offering V2 w/ Cascade Components Custom Links appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
